changeSet.sql: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.sql_logins WHERE name = '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingUsername}') CREATE LOGIN ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingUsername} WITH PASSWORD = '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingPassword}'
